overview: Hook your towel around your waist and grab your locker key, director Robert Boggs goes to the bathhouse. And no doubt the models cruising the halls inside this private men's club have but one thing in mind: getting hard and getting off. Granted, this European bathhouse may not resemble anything in America. This bathhouse more closely resembles a well-maintained gym with some extra amenities, including a pool table. In fact, a small group of young guys is finishing a game of pool when they agree to put aside their cue sticks and go off in search of a massage.
title: Relax!
